text.__SUMMARY__: Rhododendron wilhelminae is a species of plant in the family Ericaceae. It is endemic to Java in Indonesia. It is a critically endangered species threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Rhododendron wilhelminae". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31995A9668778. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31995A9668778.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
